featured.text: After working in front of my computer for the entire day, my neck and shoulders got so that I couldn’t even turn my head.
Although the term did not emerge until the 18th century, toy hoops twirled around the waist, limbs, or neck can be traced back to ancient times.

definition.zh_def: 脖子；連接頭部和身體的部分。
definition.en_def: The part of the body that connects the head to the torso.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful necklace around her neck.
